attributes.review: I am extremely disappointed and unsatisfying with the way this app functions. I was expecting to vote for trump but instead was greeted with horrible photo when I opened the app. That thing on my screen looked like a rat and had to rinse my eyes repeatedly for at least three hours. Even worse the opening screen said “keep America great” which is a horrible lie considering the history of this country. I will be uninstalling the app. Bernie 2020😗✌🏾
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: I wanted to get this app to support our wonderful president, and was sure the one star reviews were bogus. When I opened the app I was hoping to see rally information, merch, and President Trump! Instead what I saw was horrifying. It was an image of a GINORMOUS cheeto, molding around the edges. There was some type of cat hairball on the top and the orange color of the cheeto was too much for my eyes to handle! I went blind in one eye and can only see that disgusting cheeto orange color. Do not install this app if you want your eyesight.
attributes.title: TRAUMATIZING

attributes.review: I recently downloaded this app and ever a one my life has been awful i got the app at 10:00 am and i was informed it 10:02 am that my grandfather had died. it was the sadist day of my life but it only got worst as soon as i opened the app my mother disowned me and i had to move in with my evil father. there is a dog at my fathers house that attacked me as soon as i arrived and left me with scars and bruises all over my body. all of this happened because of the app save yourself and don’t get it.
attributes.title: CURSED!!!

attributes.review: Please read all of it  i downloaded the app as a joke but quickly turned into cinderella and fell in LOVE with this pumpkin of a man I mean trumpkin of a man I mean cripple anyway I got the app and was going threw it when I saw an amazing thing I picture of the trumpkins foot it was beautiful magnificent I said I neeeeeed these toes I might die without them so I drove to the White House ran to his room and stole all 15 of his toes then I ate them and now I’m a Cheeto if I knew I would turn to a Cheeto I would have eaten them thanks a lot
attributes.title: Cheeto

attributes.review: This app doesn’t even deserve one star; if I could rate it zero stars, I would. The app is glitchy and lags, and for days at a time when I open the app, it just stays at a completely blank white screen. It often freezes my phone and causes me to have to let my phone DIE to close the app. It won’t even let me restart my phone when this happens! Truly an awful app, I can’t recommend it to anyone. Disappointing.
attributes.title: Absolutely awful.

attributes.review:
